code: import React from"react";import Unverified from"@assets/images/icons/check.svg";import Verified from"@assets/images/icons/success.svg";import Pending from"@assets/images/icons/pending.svg";import"./index.sass";import{useTranslation}from"@helpers/translate";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Status=_ref=>{let{status}=_ref;const{__}=useTranslation();const statusMap={success:"verified",pending:"pending",unverified:"unverified",2:"verified",1:"pending",0:"unverified"};const textMap={success:__("common.verified"),pending:__("common.pending"),unverified:__("common.unverified"),2:__("common.verified"),1:__("common.pending"),0:__("common.unverified")};const iconMap={success:Verified,pending:Pending,unverified:Unverified,0:Unverified,2:Verified,1:Pending};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"status ".concat(statusMap[status]||statusMap.default),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"status__icon",src:"".concat(iconMap[status]||statusMap.default)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"status__text",children:textMap[status]})]});};export default Status;
